title: Sans Serifs - McDonald
content:

Hi,

Anyone know what the fonts use in this are?

thanks (in advance)

Matt

Font: 

 Dekar 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060543/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: mattbury

comments.content:
'JaneMcDonald': too close not to be it so should be [Dekar](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060543/http:/fontfabric.com/dekar-free-font) with a customized /a  
'EXTENDED REMIXED': any [DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060543/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/din) should work
